DocWhereRule.Name: WR1
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The first operand of the Boolean clipping operation shall be either an IfcSweptAreaSolid or (in case of more than one clipping) an IfcBooleanResult.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR2
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The second operand of the Boolean clipping operation shall be an IfcHalfSpaceSolid.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR3
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The Boolean operator for clipping is always "Difference".
